key_drivers: Real yields falling (DFII10 1.77%, down from ~2.0%) - primary bullish driver across GC, ES, NQ
DXY weak (-0.55% YTD, 97.70) supporting commodities, risk assets, and AUD/JPY
VIX falling (-6.95% to 19.55), HY credit spreads tight (2.95% OAS), risk-on environment
EIA crude draw (-9.0M barrels) + Iran geopolitical risk supporting CL
RBA hawkish hike (3.85%) + risk-on + copper rising supporting 6A
BoJ hiking cycle + narrowing JPY-USD differential supporting 6J

fallbacks_used: EIA inventory data from highlights PDF (Feb 19, 2026 report)
Gold ETF flows inferred from gold price action (ATH ~$5,100/oz)
data_quality.notes: DFII10 and HY OAS are 2 days stale (weekend lag). Real yield direction confirmed via chart trend. Gold ETF flows not directly verified from WGC - inferred from gold at all-time highs. Confidence reduced by 1 point for GC/SI due to ETF flow assumption. MOVE index 1-month trend rising (+15.51%) used as primary signal.
